column4: for mythtv.. does the server acctually stream the video to the front end.. or does the front end play videos and the server jsu do the recording?? i dont get how it works.. like how would i run 1 myth tv server with 2 or 3 clients (tvs) so they can all access the same content...

I don't have any experience with Myth, but I'd assume that the clients do everything but the storage, and the server does the storage. However, it's probably pretty flexible... I'd guess that you could set up the server to do the recording off of the wire and have the clients tell it what to record.
